comment: Very easy online course. Only a few writing assignments and tests, and then one small project at the end. She is very nice and everything is laid out on the syllabus for each week. Definitely recommend.

Easiest asynchronous online class with the least busy work. If you don't really care about the class, she's the one! Her "exams/quizzes" are all online, no lockdown. She was 5 writing assignments that are MAX two paragraphs. She has a fun art recreation project as well that was super easy!

overall this class was an easy A, but she is such an amazing professor overall, she gives you feedback on all assignment and is not a tough grader at all, she is so sweet and will get back to you asap. She gives a week notice before assignments are due and you can tell she wants you to succeed. I highly recommend her!!

Attendeance only mandatory on critique day. FUN, UNDERSTANDING, and really cares. I took this class Fall 2021 and she still remembers my name lol very friendly. Easy content and grading, as long as there is thought and a concept behind your work you are sure to get a good grade. 100/10 recommend. *0 u 0*
Her course was very easy. She had lots of accessible resources and the tests and quizzes weren't difficult. Attendance wasn't mandatory, but it was an interesting one to attend. Would recommend
Goss was an incredible professor. The projects for the class could be pretty difficult, but she gave lots of resources to make them easier. She gave pretty good feedback and wasn't a harsh grader.

Dr. Goss is a one-of-a-kind professor. You cannot go wrong with taking her. She is very creative and balances out lectures and videos to help you understand better. She makes a class which itself rather stale a reason to get up and go to class in the morning. She is very helpful to her students and honestly no one should fail her class. 10/10!

She was a really good professor. I hardly showed up to class towards the end of the semester just because it was an 8 am class and still had a very high A. She posts everything online for you and her classes are also very interesting with cool topics. Can't go wrong with her as your professor
